inputs.name: images
inputs.description: Images : Collections of partial Fields Of View (FOVs).

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: Output Path : where the pyramid should be created.

inputs.name: vector
inputs.description: Stitching Vector : describes partial FOV positions in the full image.

inputs.name: depth
inputs.description: Image Depth : The format is which each pixel is encoded in the output.

inputs.name: tilesize
inputs.description: TileSize : The width/length (in pixel) of the square tiles we generate in output.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Pyramid Name : the name of the pyramid we generate in output.

inputs.name: blending
inputs.description: Blending Method : strategy to handle the blending of overlapping tiles.

options.format: Output : deepZoom pyramid of png format.
